title: Free Agent Predictions + Combine Reactions, Ridley Suspended - Fantasy Football Podcast for 3/8
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with an exciting new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, free agent landing spot predictions from Andy, Mike, and Jason! Plus, reactions to the NFL Combine, and big news including Calvin Ridley being suspended for the 2022 season! Follow for year-round fantasy football content! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for March 8th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+

(02:30) - NFL Combine Reactions
(10:00) - Quick Question: Trivia
(16:00) - NFL News
(23:15) - Free Agent Predictions
(25:50) - QB Free Agents
(35:05) - RB Free Agents
(44:15) - WR Free Agents
(50:30) - TE Free Agents
